text: Coy Luther "Luke" Perry III (October 11, 1966 - March 4, 2019) was an American movie and television performer. He was known for being in the show Beverly Hills, 90210 as Dylan McKay. He acted in many movies. Perry starred as Fred Andrews in Riverdale. He was born in Mansfield, Ohio. His son is professional wrestler Jack Perry. On February 27, 2019, Perry was hospitalized after suffering a stroke at his home in Sherman Oaks, California. He died at a hospital in Burbank on March 4, 2019, aged 52.Luke Perry, ‘90210’ and ‘Riverdale’ Star, Dies at 52 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Actors from Ohio Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:1966 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke
title: Luke Perry
